favourite.article: Very uplifting. Blessed be the songwriter. Blessed be all those whose hope is in the Lord. Their tears will be turned to joy and they will weep no more. How great Thou art. Amen
Beautiful the hope we have! Thank you for sharing this song. Very encouraging!
I Like the tune. But I am not clear how to sing stanzas 3,4,5,6. Can someone help out? I won't mind an actual singing of all the lines in my email, if possible. Grace
